backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with access-controlled user profiles and a public contact-request submission system stored in lists and maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a header-height reduction change to affected frontend files and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files, describing structure, styling, and component behavior.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Asset config ensuring the .well-known directory is included when deploying frontend canister assets.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH theme variables and dark mode definitions applied to base elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React application root.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: IC custom-domain verification file listing the apex and www domain names.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing major crawlers full access for SEO.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing all landing page sections with header, sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section with descriptive text, trust indicators, and a featured image.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Formspree-backed contact form with required fields and styled input components.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact area combining the contact form with business details and social links.
Renders a features grid showcasing four service highlights with icons, text, and a CTA video link.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays footer with branding, navigation links, legal links, and attribution including dynamic year and referral URL.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Provides a fullscreen hero with background image, headline, description, and buttons that scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/LandingHeader.ts: Implements a responsive header with scroll effects, navigation links, logo, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/ScheduleConsulta: Shows a consultation booking section that loads and displays a Calendly widget when triggered.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContactReque: Empty or placeholder file with no implementation provided.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables plus global layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Provides a smooth-scrolling function that scrolls to a section ID with header offset handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, loading global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and responsive settings using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and new feature requests for the header height reduction project.
